channel.title: html on Julian Markiewicz
channel.description: Recent content in html on Julian Markiewicz

item.title: News reader
item.description: Based mainly on requests made to Google news API, news reader. This short project also utilizes Weatherbit API. In this project technologies such as angular2, bootstrap were used.

item.title: Project management tool
item.description: Simple Jira clone that allows people in a project to manage tasks and sprints. In this project technologies such as angular2, bootstrap, node.js and mongoDB were used.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This post was originally published on dev.to website. So Hi! Kinda awkward to write a post on Dev.to. I use tricks, tips, reading articles from this website almost every day, but I have never written a post in here (so for me this is a bit of a big deal, but from now on I will try to muster my excitement). Github actions are something I was hoping to try sooner but there had always been an excuse.
